name: envy-json
description: Read a javascript object, JSON string, or JSON file and replace values like '$foo' with process.env.foo
readme:
# ENVy JSON

> Read a javascript object, JSON string, or JSON file and replace values like '$foo' with process.env.foo

## Install It

```sh
npm install envy-json --save
```

## Use It

See the [tests](test/index.js).
